page.title: 12MY TOWN: HEDNESFORD
page.content: I am thirteen and I have lived in Hednesford all my life. At first I lived in Sharon Way on a fairly new estate.Now I live in Green Heath Road. Hednesford is a small town and people go further afield to work. In the town centre there are 3 chemists, 2 supermarkets, several greengrocers and shoe shops.There is an open market,several public houses,clubs and a wine bar called "Raffles". The only places for teenagers in Hednesford are the park and the police disco held at the Aquarius, the community hall. In the summer holidays teenagers have nowhere to go and so they "hang around". I would not expect passers by to stop at Hednesford. It is nothing special but quite adequate for the people who live here.
